message: Suddenly off-balance, I stumble into his chest.
I look up... and my heart skips a beat.
Koujaku? Is that really you?
He's staring at me with eyes so dark I almost don't recognize him.
A drop of water drips off his bangs, rolls down his cheek, and falls from his chin.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Koujaku?"

name: 紅雀
message: "...What do you think you're doing?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: 紅雀
message: "What did you say to him?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Him? ...Hey!"
Suddenly, Koujaku grabs my shoulders and pushes.
I'm already off-balance, so it doesn't take much effort to force me back onto the bed.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! You're too damn heav―!"

name: 紅雀
message: "What did you say to him?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku?"

name: 紅雀
message: "What did you..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you talking ab―ngh!"
Koujaku roughly pins my hands against the sheets.
Him? Him who? Who is he talking about?
And what's with his eyes? I can't even tell where he's looking.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, man... you okay?"
Koujaku presses his face to my shoulder. I immediately feel a sharp pain on my neck.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ouch!"
Did he just bite me?!
Next, I feel something warm and slimy against my skin.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wh-What are you doing?!"
The slippery sensation slides over the bite. I hear moist sounds, and ragged breathing.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku...! Stop...!"
But my squirming doesn't seem to bother Koujaku in the least. He goes right on licking and biting my neck.
What...
What the actual fuck is going on?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey!"
When he rolls my shirt up―that's when I really start to panic.
He gives my neck one more lick, then slides his tongue to my ear.
I don't know what the hell is happening, but I know it's gonna get real weird if I don't stop it soon.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku! What the hell are you thinking?! I said stop!"
I try to push him off.
Koujaku merely tightens his grip, fingernails digging into my wrists as if demanding submission. That's all it takes to keep me pinned.
The blood drains from my face. It's like he doesn't hear a word I'm saying.
Has he lost his mind?
He looks like Koujaku, but he's acting like another person entirely.
Icy dread rises in the pit of my gut.
What the hell do I do?!
With a faint groan, he shoves his hand beneath my bunched-up shirt.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wha?! Hey!"
His calloused hands slide over my skin and grope my chest.
I'm sweating with fear, and the moisture makes his hands stick to my skin.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Get! Off! Seriously, what the fuck are you―ah!"
He licks my ear, then blows into it, his breath hot and wet.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku... Koujaku!!!"
I struggle harder, but Koujaku overpowers me with terrifying strength and jams his tongue into my ear canal.
The noise, thick and moist, drowns out my thoughts. I try to turn my head away, but that's when I feel something against my crotch.
Koujaku has slipped his hand into my pants and taken a firm hold of my junk.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let... go, man! Stop it!"
I squirm frantically, but Koujaku doesn't let go.
Why is this happening? And why with Koujaku?

name: 竜峰
message: "You oughta be careful, though. You seem like a trusting sort. But one wrong move and chomp! The person you trusted might turn around and bite you."

name: 竜峰
message: "They might just gobble you up. Dig?"
Why? Why does this have to happen?
What's changed inside of Koujaku? I don't understand. This isn't the world I know.
But of course... I don't really know anything about Koujaku, do I?
A sharp pain shoots through my head.
My head...!
<center>　――――　DESTROY　――――</center>
<center>　――――　DESTROY　――――</center>
A voice emerges from the pounding in my skull.
<center>　――――　DESTROY　――――</center>
<center>　――――　NOW　――――</center>
But... I don't want to!
<center>　――――　DESTROY HIM　――――</center>
No!
A jolt of pleasure brings me back to reality. Koujaku is aggressively stroking my manhood.
I can't believe it. How can any part of me be enjoying this?
What am I? A man? Or a plaything?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "No! Stop it!"
<center>　――――　DESTROY　――――</center>
<center>　――――　DESTROY　――――</center>
I don't want to destroy! But if I do nothing... I'll lose Koujaku forever.
I don't want our relationship to end. Why does it have to be like this?
Please. Make it stop.
<center>　――――　DESTROY　――――</center>
<center>　――――　DESTROY HIM　――――</center>
Stop it!

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Stop, Koujaku!"
This time, it works. Koujaku stops. Why now?
Gradually, his eyes regain their focus. He seems to recognize me, finally.
His eyes widen. His lips quiver.
It's like he didn't know what was happening either.
The moment I see that look on his face... my right hand is in motion.
Koujaku freezes once again, face turned to the side by the impact of my slap.
It dawns on me that I hit him.

Shit...
Sorry. My hand just... moved.
But I can't get the words out. My hand is still shaking. I grip it firmly with my left hand to still it.
I'm not even sure why I hit him.
It felt like an eruption from somewhere deep inside me... but an eruption of what?
I want to apologize. But I can't.
Koujaku... Why?
That one question dominates my thoughts.
I look at Koujaku, hoping for an answer.
Say something. Anything.
Yell. Get angry, if you want.
Just... say something.
But Koujaku doesn't try to speak. His cheek grows redder by the second.
Silence fills the room, unwanted.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Why? Why>"
The words quiver on my tongue, as if I were crying.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why won't you say something?!"
All I feel is grief.
No matter how I struggle, I can't get through. He doesn't understand me. I don't understand him.
We aren't on the same page. We aren't even in the same universe.
Koujaku closes his eyes, brow knotted, then turns his back to me.
And then, he leaves without a word.
